# What is R-Ladies?

- R-Ladies is a world-wide organization with the mission of promoting **gender diversity in the R community**  

- Started in San Francisco in 2012 and now has **193 chapters and more than 73,000** members globally (check out rladies.org for a SHINY dashboard)
<center>
![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EPlDKUQUcAEq5pw?format=jpg&name=small)
